short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Selects nicknames of people with old registrations. Friendlist. Some Sound. Delete replies to ignored users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension created for "btc-e.nz", now - "wex.nz".
What it can do:
• Selects nicknames of people with old registrations
• Adds FriendsList
• Adds sound on replies
• Fixes bug with built-in ignore-list (you will never see ignored person)
• Delete replies to ignored users
